game.name: ホロダンジョン 博衣こよりとホロウライブ in ホンシャタワー
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Keyboard Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Wonderful maze “HoloDungeon” changes form with each challenge—within it lurks Hollow, beings not unlike Holomen. To rescue her snatched friends and make special Live a success, Hakui Koyori tries an unknown adventure! Roguelike RPG where you play using wisdom and brains remain even after down.
